author: Associated Press
title: ‘I May Take It.’ Trump Again Touts Hydroxychloroquine, Which Has Major Potential Side Effects, as COVID-19 Treatment
description: President Donald Trump is again touting a drug used to treat certain other diseases in hope that it will help fend off the new coronavirus.
content:
WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump is again touting a drug used to treat certain other diseases and says he may take it himself in hope that it will help fend off the new coronavirus.
Trump says “there’s a rumor out there” that hydroxychloroquine is effecti… [+620 chars]
